titleStmt.title: A sermon of the fifth monarchy. Proving by invincible arguments, that the saints shall have a kingdom here on earth, which is yet to come, after the fourth monarchy is destroy'd by the sword of the saints, the followers of the lamb. / Preached by Mr. Tho. Goodwin, on Rev. 5. 9, 10. By which it will appear, that it is for the same truth (that formerly was so much contended for) that some of the people of God suffer at this day. Published for the truths sake.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Livewel Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
